version_description:
- iOs 9 compatibility.
- Fix broken bluetooth multiplayer on iOs 9 devices.

- iOs 10 compatibility.
- Fix broken bluetooth multiplayer on iOs 10 devices.
- Bugs fixed.

- Bugs fixed.
- Fixed local-multiplayer connection problems.
- Local multiplayer on iOs 11 requires Wifi to be activated, Bluetooth is not supported anymore.

- Adapted interface for iPhone X.
- Fixed bugs.

- Compatibility with iOs 13.
- Bugs fixed.
- Add support for game center game using custom game options.
